LawOfCyclesPower.NAME: Law Of Cycles
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse, Exhaust it, then add #b
Miracle into your hand.

DemonPower.NAME: Demon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
Strength for each Curse you have.

M18A1Power.NAME: Mines
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, deal equal damage back. Removed after #b
attack.

BombMakingPower.NAME: Bomb Making
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
IED into your hand.

BombMakingUpPower.NAME: Bomb Making+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
IED+ into your hand.

ClocksPower.NAME: Clock
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 12 cards, add #b
Vault into your hand.

ClocksUpPower.NAME: Clock+
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 12 cards, add #b
Vault+ into your hand.

StockPower.NAME: Stock Up
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
random Arm into your hand.

StockUpPower.NAME: Stock Up+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
random Upgraded Arm into your hand.

StaminaPower.NAME: Stamina
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play an Attack, draw #b
random Skill from your draw pile. When you play a Skill, draw #b
random Attack from your draw pile.

FalseTownPower.NAME: False Town
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
new Servant to your draw pile and add #b
random Curse to your discard pile.

ZeroEnergePower.NAME: Time Stop
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next card costs 0.

MoveAndFirePower.NAME: Run and Gun
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, gain #b
Block.

TwiningPower.NAME: Twining
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b
Energy.

UntiePower.NAME: Untie
DESCRIPTIONS: Immune to Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.

TimeBombPower.NAME: TimeBomb
DESCRIPTIONS: At end of turn take #b
damage
